mapper.select: select e.dept_id as dept_id, e.emp_nm as emp_nm, e.emp_id as emp_id, e.sex_id as sex_id, s.sex_nm as sex_nm, p.pos_nm as pos_nm, e.e_mail as e_mail, e.join_dt as join_dt, e.pos_id as pos_id from EMP e inner join POS p on e.pos_id = p.pos_id inner join SEX s on e.sex_id = s.sex_id and e.emp_id = #{emp_id}
